atkreduction: ATK Reduction: Lv 1/2/3: Reduces ATK by x/x/52%
atkincrease: ATK Increase Lv. 1/2/3: Increases by ATK 42/55/84%
matkincrease: M. ATK Reduction Lv 1/2/3/4: Reduces ATK by x/x/x/84%
critrateincrease: Crit % Increase Lv. 1/2/3/4: Increase Crit % by x/18/22/26%
defincrease: DEF Increase Lv. 1/2/3: Increases DEF by x/x/175%
defreduction: DEF Reduction Lv. 1/2/3: Reduces DEF by x/50/x%
dpincrease: DP Increase Lv. 1/2/3/4: Increases DP by x/40/75%
poison: Poison: Takes damage equal to 5% of max HP at the start of the turn, up to 1 time
taunt: Taunt: Attacks the target with the effect.
weaponenhancement: Weapon Enhancement Lv. 1/2/3: Increases damage by 30/x/x%
stun: Stun: You will be disabled and will lose your turn
incapacitate: Incapacitate Lv. 1/2/3/4/5: Increases damage taken by x/x/x/x/70%
burn: Burn: At the start of the turn, receive damage equal to [ATK: 15%, M. ATK: 15%], up to 3 times
bleed: Bleed: Takes damage equal to 5% of max HP at the start of the turn, up to 1 time
freeze: Freeze: Target will be disabled and will lose their next turn
defensivestance: Defensive Stance: Reduces damage taken by 50%.
statusailment: Status Ailment: Types of Status Ailment: Stun, Freeze, Mutation
mark: Mark: Gains an additional turn after defeating a Marked enemy
continuousdamage: Continuous Damage: Types of Continuous Damage: Burn, Bleed, Poison, Shock
dpresreduction: DP Res. Reduction Lv. 1/2/3: Reduces DP Res. by x/x/35%
sever: Applies [Damage Increase] to self proportionate to your remaining HP (max 30%)
dmgresincrease: DMG RES. Lv. 1/2/3: Increeases DMG RES. by: x/x/32%
protection: Protection: The selected friendly target cannot be targeted
